name: Supreme Chicken Pizza Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Supreme Chicken Pizza Recipe: Pizza Dough 1kg Chicken Boneless ½ kg Onion 1 Tomato 1 Olives 12 Cream ½ cup Oregano 1 tsp Mushrooms 1 cup Black Pepper 1 tsp Salt ½ tsp Pizza Sauce 1 cup Tomato Sauce 2 tsp Capsicum 1
instructions: Roll out the dough with the help of rolling pin. Marinate chicken, with black pepper, salt , tomato sauce and leave it for 10 minutes. Then add in dry pan. After this, In a pizza dough add pizza sauce, chicken. Add Onion, Tomato, Capsicum, Oregano, Olives, Cream and Mushrooms. Bake it 150c for half an hour.
